Pokemon.Name: Pikachu
Pokemon.Description: Electric mouse Pokémon with iconic red cheeks and lightning-bolt tail.

Pokemon.Name: Charmander
Pokemon.Description: Fire-type lizard with a flame on its tail.

Pokemon.Name: Squirtle
Pokemon.Description: Water-type turtle known for its ability to squirt water.

Pokemon.Name: Bulbasaur
Pokemon.Description: Grass/Poison-type with a plant bulb on its back.

Pokemon.Name: Eevee
Pokemon.Description: Normal-type fox-like Pokémon with multiple evolution possibilities.

Pokemon.Name: Jolteon
Pokemon.Description: Electric-type evolution of Eevee with spiky yellow fur.

Pokemon.Name: Vaporeon
Pokemon.Description: Water-type evolution of Eevee with fish-like features.

Pokemon.Name: Flareon
Pokemon.Description: Fire-type evolution of Eevee with fluffy orange fur.

Pokemon.Name: Caterpie
Pokemon.Description: Bug-type caterpillar Pokémon that evolves into Butterfree.

Pokemon.Name: Magmar
Pokemon.Description: Fire-type Pokémon resembling a duck-billed dinosaur with flames.

Pokemon.Name: Horsea
Pokemon.Description: Water-type seahorse Pokémon that spits ink.

Pokemon.Name: Electabuzz
Pokemon.Description: Electric-type humanoid Pokémon with black stripes.
